title: MissBirdy's Artist Page
content:
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:black-highlighter-theme]]
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:jakstyle]]

[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]


[[size large]]MissBirdy here. My artwork is organized by the authors who wrote the articles/tales that my pieces are based on since I prefer to work with authors individually on creating character designs.

I create character designs for authors who'd appreciate some sort of visualization of their characters. Currently I focus on humans and humanoids, but I hope as I build up my portfolio on here, that I'll be able to get even further out of my comfort zone.

Thank you for taking interest in my artwork! Please let me know of any articles you recommend I read to make artwork of :)[[/size]]

[[=image https://i.ibb.co/wpJTNCZ/Twitch-Stream-2.jpg width="350em"]]

-----
